Source.Name: networkmanager-qt
Source.Summary: Qt wrapper for NetworkManager DBus API
Source.Description: NetworkManagerQt provides access to all NetworkManager features exposed on DBus. It allows you to manage your connections and control your network devices and also provides a library for parsing connection settings which are used in DBus communication.
